mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMAIL, E.MOBILE, E.ROLE, D.DEPT_NO, D.DEPT_NAME, P.POS_NO, P.POS_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO JOIN POSITION P ON E.POS_NO = P.POS_NO WHERE E.EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%' OR D.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%'
mapper.insert:
SELECT MSG_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO MESSAGE ( MSG_NO , MSG_CONTENTS , READ_YN , DEL_YN , STAR_YN , MSG_CREATE_DT , MSG_SENDER , MSG_RECEIVER ) VALUES ( #{msgNo} , #{contents} , 'N' , 'N' , 'N' , SYSDATE , #{sender} , #{receiver} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE M JOIN EMPLOYEE ES ON M.MSG_SENDER = ES.EMP_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE ER ON M.MSG_RECEIVER = ER.EMP_NO WHERE M.MSG_RECEIVER = ${empNo} AND M.STAR_YN = 'N'

SELECT RN, M.MSG_NO, M.MSG_CONTENTS, M.READ_YN, M.DEL_YN, M.STAR_YN , M.MSG_CREATE_DT, M.MSG_SENDER, M.MSG_RECEIVER, ES.EMP_NAME AS SENDER_NAME, ER.EMP_NAME AS RECEIVER_NAME FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY M.MSG_CREATE_DT DESC) AS RN, M.MSG_NO, M.MSG_CONTENTS, M.READ_YN, M.DEL_YN, M.STAR_YN, M.MSG_CREATE_DT, M.MSG_SENDER, M.MSG_RECEIVER FROM MESSAGE M WHERE M.MSG_RECEIVER = #{empNo} AND M.STAR_YN = 'N') M JOIN EMPLOYEE ES ON M.MSG_SENDER = ES.EMP_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE ER ON M.MSG_RECEIVER = ER.EMP_NO WHERE M.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT RN, M.MSG_NO, M.MSG_CONTENTS, M.READ_YN, M.DEL_YN, M.STAR_YN , M.MSG_CREATE_DT, M.MSG_SENDER, M.MSG_RECEIVER, ES.EMP_NAME AS SENDER_NAME, ER.EMP_NAME AS RECEIVER_NAME FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY M.MSG_CREATE_DT DESC) AS RN, M.MSG_NO, M.MSG_CONTENTS, M.READ_YN, M.DEL_YN, M.STAR_YN, M.MSG_CREATE_DT, M.MSG_SENDER, M.MSG_RECEIVER FROM MESSAGE M WHERE M.MSG_SENDER = #{empNo}) M JOIN EMPLOYEE ES ON M.MSG_SENDER = ES.EMP_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE ER ON M.MSG_RECEIVER = ER.EMP_NO WHERE M.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT M.MSG_NO, M.MSG_CONTENTS, M.READ_YN, M.DEL_YN, M.STAR_YN, M.MSG_CREATE_DT, M.MSG_SENDER, M.MSG_RECEIVER , ES.EMP_NAME AS SENDER_NAME, ER.EMP_NAME AS RECEIVER_NAME FROM MESSAGE M JOIN EMPLOYEE ES ON M.MSG_SENDER = ES.EMP_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE ER ON M.MSG_RECEIVER = ER.EMP_NO WHERE M.MSG_NO = #{msgNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE M JOIN EMPLOYEE ES ON M.MSG_SENDER = ES.EMP_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE ER ON M.MSG_RECEIVER = ER.EMP_NO WHERE M.MSG_SENDER = #{empNo} AND M.STAR_YN = 'Y'
